title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 8189.16 - Filing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 8189.16 - Filing

State Regulations
(a) The original
tax maps, when approved by ORPTS, shall be filed in the office of the county
director of real property tax services. A single copy of the tax map and the
supporting information specified in section
8189.14
(c) of this Part shall be filed with the assessor. (b) During each assessment year, the county
director shall file with the assessor of each city, town and village either new
section maps or necessary changes to existing tax maps. The tax map available
for inspection with the tentative assessment roll shall include land parcel
changes as of taxable status date. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
8189.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
